okama.api.data_queries module¶

class okama.api.data_queries.QueryData¶

Bases: object

Set of methods to get symbols data from API.

static csv_to_series(csv_input, period)¶
static get_adj_close(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01', period='M')¶

Gets ‘adjusted close’ time series for a ticker.

static get_close(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01', period='M')¶

Gets ‘close’ time series for a ticker.

static get_dividends(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01')¶

Dividends time series daily data (dividend payment day should be considered).

static get_live_price(symbol)¶
static get_macro_ts(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01')¶

Requests API for Macroeconomic indicators time series (monthly data). - Inflation time series - Bank rates time series

static get_nav(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01', period='M')¶

NAV time series for funds (works for PIF namespace only).

static get_ror(symbol, first_date='1913-01-01', last_date='2100-01-01', period='M')¶

Requests API for rate of return time series.
